attributes.action: Keep the British Grand Prix at Silverstone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bernie Eclestone has announced that the British GP will be moving to Donington. Silverstone is not only one of the fastest tracks in F1 but is also one of the best circuits for overtaking, Eclestone said that "We wanted a world class venue for Formula One in Britain, something that the teams and British F1 fans could be proud of." Sliverstone is a venue we can be proud of.Sign this petition to keep the British GP where it belongs.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep the British Grand Prix at Silverstone."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21840


Prime Minister's Office
